title: Pls read guy from riot who organises the summoner iconz
body:
Hi, 

A long time ago there was a christmas teemo icon. You had to do a challenge for it to get it, and i thought i had got it but i clearly have not.

Would you at all be open to a 1v1?

 If i win you have to give me the christmas teemo icon, If i lose I'll gift you whatever skin, wards skin or icon you would like... if you dont have them already that is. :)

Thanks! :D

{{champion:17}}

replies.body: :( ok well that's not very fun then.

> i thought i had got it but i clearly have not.

Then contacting support is the only way to sort it out. You won't get it from challenging a rioter to a match.
